revised_title: On the Motion of a Sphere in a Viscous Liquid: Force and Gravity
tldr: The author investigates the motion of a sphere in a viscous liquid, focusing on the cases where the sphere moves in a straight line under the action of a constant force, such as gravity, and when the sphere is surrounded by a viscous liquid and set in rotation. The study provides equations for the motion and offers approximations for the acceleration and velocity of the sphere.
